title: Thank you so much for making champion shards cost IP
body: I have every champion, so I'm able to use those shards for blue essence for master tokens.  That's honestly great.  It takes so long to get keys and get lucky enough to get a champion to disenchant.  That's really awesome.  Thanks, again.

replies.body: Then it's even better when a new champ comes out, just reroll 3 shards and get the new champ for cheaper
That's how I got like half of my champs lol
